body.name: LuxLumin LED Double Head Desk Lamp for Home Office,Portable Small Desk Lamp with Large Lighting Range, Battery Operated Rechargeable Desk Light for Kids, Reading,Studying,Home,Office,Dormitory,Blue
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 19 hrs 2 mins
features: 【Dual Head Modern Design】The table lamp adopts a double-head design.The left and right head can be unfolded into a straight line, the maximum angle can reach 180 degrees, with the 160-degree swing angle in up and down direction, providing you with a larger lighting coverage and angle. Foldable design makes it effectively reduce writing shadows.

【3 Lighting Modes and Stepless Dimmable】With a sensitive touch switch, you can freely switch 3 lighting modes-warm white, natural white and cold white. In each mode, the brightness can be adjusted to suit your various lighting needs. Besides, the brightness can be remembered when you choose this mode again, which can save your time to adjust the brightness one more time.

【Rechargeable Battery Operated Desk Lamp 】Built in high quality 2000mAh battery, you can take your table lamp to anywhere you need the light. It can last Max 15 hours lighting in lowest brightness. It comes in 32 inch USB cable (AC Adapter is not included), can be powered by USB Charger, Computer, Power bank, Phone Adapter, etc. You can use anytime, anywhere.

【Eye Protection Portable Reading Lights】LuxLumin double-swing-arm lamp has high quality 32 LEDs to offer flicker-free, non-shadow, flicker-free, uniform lighting. Perfect for working, reading, study, webcam Zoom and soft light allows you to read in bed without disturbing others.

【Safe and Reliable After-sales Service】LuxLumin Table Lamp is using fire-resistant ABS material and it is safe and cool to touch after extensive use. We offer 12 months warranty and we welcome any emails or messages about our desk lamp. We will provide our professional answer in 24/7 to make you satisfied and happy.
body.description: LuxLumin Small Desk Lamp Suitable for Reading, Studing,Working,drawing The new LuxLumin double head desk lamp features a modern, minimalist design. With double head 32pcs upgraded LED units to deliver more uniform and wide luminance than others. Small desk lamp simulates the natural light diffuse reflection, no flash, no glare, which can protect your eyesight and reduce eye stain.Warm Reminder: If the desk lamp received cannot light on, please charge the battery firstly and it can light on. 1x Desk Lamp 1x USB cable 1x User Manual

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Double Head Desk Lamp Specificaton Material: ABS Plastic+LED Power: 5W Voltage: 5 Volts Battery Capacity: 2000mAh Color: Warm/Natual/Cool White Runtime: 2-3h (High brightness) 7-9h (Medium brightness) 12-15h (Low brightness) LuxLumin Small Desk Lamp Suitable for Reading, Studing,Working,drawing The new LuxLumin double head desk lamp features a modern, minimalist design. With double head 32pcs upgraded LED units to deliver more uniform and wide luminance than others. Small desk lamp simulates the natural light diffuse reflection, no flash, no glare, which can protect your eyesight and reduce eye stain.Warm Reminder: If the desk lamp received cannot light on, please charge the battery firstly and it can light on. 1x Desk Lamp 1x USB cable 1x User Manual

Small Desk Lamp Battery Operated Desk Lamp Build-in 2000mAh Large battery, rechargeable from your laptop, phone charger, power bank or USB port. No worry about replacement batteries. It takes about 2 hours to get full charged Non-flicking Desk Light Eye-caring table lamp is designed to be soft, stable light. No flicking, no flash, no glare, balanced light is better for your eyes. Touch Control study lamp Short press to change the colors. Long press to set the brightness. Besides it can used as a phone holder.

Desk Lamp for Home Office Foldable and Portable desk light With the novel and compact design, you can easilly carry this foldable lamp for travling, camping, and other occasions. The small desk lamp is a great space-saver. More colors choices We have white, bule, pink colors for your choices. It is a cute gift for your children. We are sure they will love it. Great table lamp It is widely used in your home, office, bedroom. good choices for kids, student to read, study, work etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE IT SO MUCH
reviews.reviewText: Incredibly lightweight. LOVE the place u can put your phone. I didn’t even realize that before buying it. Love everything about the design. Really good light too! Brighter than my other one and way more easily adjustable. I love how it splits and turns and adjusts. I don’t think the battery life is crazy long and it starts fading as the battery dies but I just need it plugged in anyways to stay bright and on through my work day. GET IT :) super cute

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great task light.
reviews.reviewText: Bright enough and love the wide light range when opened.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The light options are a nice touch
reviews.reviewText: The only reason I rated 4/5 is that the light doesn’t last much longer than a half hour unplugged, however, the soft and hard light option is quite nice and easy to use. The light splitting does well to illuminate a larger area. Despite being a 4/5 instead of being a 5/5 I am still satisfied and would recommend this to someone needing a small and economical solution to needing a lamp.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars works great - poor battery life
reviews.reviewText: Basically what the title says. Great for the price, but the battery life is not great. The brightness is better if it is plugged in/charging while using it. But, it's cute, lightweight, cheap, and useful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cordless and portable
reviews.reviewText: So convenient! There are areas in my home too dark. I just grab this little lamp and use it for when I'm in those areas where I need more light. It could use a heavier base, but it's so inexpensive that it's nbd. Better than lanterns sometimes bc light can be directed to subject rather than be blinded by it. Make nice little gifts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for what it is
reviews.reviewText: Works exactly as described. Bought it instead of flashlight for emergencies since once charged, you can unplug it & carry it around. It does have 3 light levels and has diffeent configurations. Can read by it & not disturb someone watching tv, but not bright enough for only lighting a small bedroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I have a small fish tank for my betta and I use this as a light for her. It's light weight and I love all the different settings. The base is also skinny which doesn't take up much room and doesn't need to be plugged in. Only thing I don't like about it, is the light only lasts about 10 hours. But that's just me as a pet mom. If you aren't using this for extended period of time, you won't have any issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I gave this product 2 stars because it was bright for the first few minutes after a full charge and it would slowly fade until I died completely. I originally purchased this as a portable lighting for when I am studying late at night however now it sits in my drawer for when I desperately need a light for a duration of 5 minutes. I guess I was hoping that this would be a solution to not plugging in a desk lamp to work at night. I am slightly disappointed that it did not last long and it was also a bit flimsy. It would fall if it were hit slightly by my book or if I accidentally hit my desk walking by.
